messages.subject: New Character sketch
messages.msgSnippet: Yay! Shinobu-chan s here! lol... Right (straightens up). Ahem. I ve posted a pic of Shinobu, Hiro and Yuki s daughter, in Single Originals . She may not be
messages.messageBody:
Yay! Shinobu-chan's here! lol...

Right (straightens up). Ahem. I've posted a pic of Shinobu, Hiro and
Yuki's daughter, in "Single Originals". She may not be appearing for
several chapters, but she's going to make her presence known very
soon...^_^

--M.
